answerText: Modern Love[10] This author of Modern Love is known for novels such as The Ordeal of Richard Feverel and Diana of the Crossways as well as one in which Sir Willoughby Patterne meets such women as Laetitia Dale and Clara Middleton.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 1 | 1 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One section of this work describes "that fatal knife, / Deep questioning," while it earlier expresses dismay that wisdom comes only to the old because "Little avails that coinage to the old!" Â For 10 points each: [10] Name this sequence of 16-line sonnets written after its author's wife left him for another man.
